      • calculateFitDimension

        public static android.graphics.Point calculateFitDimension(int oriWidth,
                                           int oriHeight,
                                           int dstWidth,
                                           int dstHeight,
                                           boolean isFit)
        Calculate final dimension of source image to fit or over bound to a destination image.
        Parameters:
        oriWidth - The width of a source image.
        oriHeight - The height of a source image.
        dstWidth - The width of a destination image.
        dstHeight - The height of a destination image.
        isFit - Whether source image wants to fit to destination image or not. If isFit is false, it would be over bound to destination image.
        Returns:
        The final dimension of source image.

      • getBitmapDimension

        public static android.graphics.Point getBitmapDimension(android.graphics.Point src,
                                        android.graphics.Point dst,
                                        boolean isFit,
                                        boolean bBoundSource)
        Get final dimension of source image. It considers fit / over bound, and whether it should be bounded by source image.
        Parameters:
        src - The dimension of source image.
        dst - The dimension of destination image.
        isFit - Whether source image wants to fit to destination image or not. If isFit is false, it would be over bound by destination image.
        bBoundSource - Whether source image wants to be bounded by source image if its final dimension is large than original dimension.
        Returns:
        The final dimension of source image.
